data.title: The Thibaults; Translated from the French by Madeleine Boyd. Volume One I. The Gray Notebook, II. The Penitentiary; Volume Two I. The Springtime of Life
data.meta_description: New York: Boni and Liveright, 1926. First American edition. Two vols., 8vos, 319 + 312pp; cloth. One of the last pages in the first volume rumpled, either from a binding defect or from an act of carelessness in replacing the book in its slipcase, otherwise fine, bright, fresh copies in brilliant unfaded red dust jackets with a just a few tiny chips; publisher's original slipcase. Item #205085
data.text:
New York: Boni and Liveright, 1926. First American edition. Two vols., 8vos, 319 + 312pp; cloth. One of the last pages in the first volume rumpled, either from a binding defect or from an act of carelessness in replacing the book in its slipcase, otherwise fine, bright, fresh copies in brilliant unfaded red dust jackets with a just a few tiny chips; publisher's original slipcase. Item #205085

An excellent set of the first part of Du Gard's long, multi-part novel to appear in English. He would receive the Nobel Prize for Literature in 1937.
